name: mooed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
moo
to make the long, deep sound that a cow makes: A dozen cows mooed sadly. A calf mooed nearby, and its mother answered in a deep contralto.
More examplesFewer examplesIt's not the case that every cow moos. I could hear the cows mooing in the distance. Hearing her favourite cow moo and bellow, she ran to look through the window.
